content: 249  7.3, “IBM z16 features and function support overview” on page 252  7.4, “Support by features and functions” on page 265  7.5, “z/OS migration considerations” on page 317  7.6, “IBM z/VM migration considerations” on page 322  7.7, “z/VSE migration considerations” on page 323  7.8, “Software licensing” on page 323  7.9, “References” on page 326 7 248 IBM z16 (3931) Technical Guide 7.1 Operating systems summary The minimum operating system levels that are required on IBM z16 servers are listed in Table 7-1. Table 7-1 IBM z16 minimum operating systems requirements The use of specific features depends on the operating system. In all cases, program temporary fixes (PTFs) might be required with the operating system level that is indicated. Check the z/OS fix categories, or the subsets of the 3931DEVICE (IBM z16 A01) PSP buckets for z/VM and z/VSE. The fix categories and the PSP buckets are continuously updated. They contain the latest information about maintenance. Hardware and
